bug.author: whiletruelearn
bug.summary: Using the Bring Your Own Algorithm Config with Estimator , no way currently to pass VPC configs
bug.description:
Please fill out the form below. <denchmark-h:h3>System Information</denchmark-h>
Framework (e.g. TensorFlow) / Algorithm (e.g. KMeans): BYO Algorithm Framework Version: NA Python Version: 2.7 CPU or GPU: CPU Python SDK Version: 1.9.2 Are you using a custom image: Yes
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the problem</denchmark-h>
We use sage.estimator.Estimator for passing the training image and other details needed for training. Currently this API doesn't accept any vpc config. <denchmark-h:h3>Minimal repro / logs</denchmark-h>
Exact command to reproduce:

comments.comment: Thank you for creating a PR!
PR is merged. Closing the issue.
